'''Chris''' is a clerk at a baby store.

==History==
When Charlotte and Cooper came into the store looking for a stroller, they asked Chris about different models. She said it's really better to carry the baby. Charlotte told her she was carrying three babies and asked what she should do then. Cooper decided to spare Chris from Charlotte's crankiness and told her they would find her if they needed help.

==Career==
She works at a baby store.

==Notes and Trivia==
*She carried her baby (or babies) rather than using a stroller.
